title: Common Core Explained
teaser: The Common Core State Standards will tell educators what to expect of students, but not what or how to teach. […]
description: The Common Core State Standards will tell educators what to expect of students, but not what or how to teach. […]
contentencoded:
The Common Core State Standards will tell educators what to expect of students, but not what or how to teach. Here’s a primer on the Common Core from one of the groups responsible for it.


Guest: Chris Minnich, Executive Director, Council of Chief State School Officers.
